pullrequest.title: Add compile-time defaults for env vars (issue #781)

content.raw: Just a note that now the env variable `GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH` is empty, users would still need to source `setup.sh` first in order to append custom paths to `GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH` if they wish to use models located in non-default directories. This is a good change nevertheless.
content.html: Just a note that now the env variable GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH is empty, users would still need to source setup.sh first in order to append custom paths to GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH if they wish to use models located in non-default directories. This is a good change nevertheless.
